text: Ra jaba hamile manisaharula'i duhkha pugepachi aphno dayale sukhako svada cakha'umchau, tyatikhera tiniharule hamra ayataharuko barema sadyantra garna thalchan. Tapa'i bhanidinus ki allahale chittai aphno yojana sampanna garnevala cha ra juna sadyantrapurna yojana timile bana'irakheka chau, hamra pharistaharu ti sabai lekhirakheka chan
